other_tests.findings: EEGs were normal, in both the awake and drowsy states, and no seizure activity was present.
Cytogenetic evaluation revealed a mosaic karyotype: 46,XY,del (4)(p16.3) [6.6%]/46,XY[93.4%].
other_tests.changes_over_time: At 4 years, FISH analysis revealed a 65% percent mosaic 4p16.3 deletion.

other_tests.findings: X-ray examination revealed the relative shortness of tubular bones, especially of distal and middle phalanges.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Finding of relative shortness of tubular bones remained consistent at both ages.

other_tests.findings: Revealed CS5 stage of maturation of the cervical vertebrae.
Provided detailed information on facial typology, mandibular growth and shape, skeletal relationships, and dental report.
